snippet.title: OUT OF THE BLUE - You only have 32 steps before you run out of energy in this dungeon crawl!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://atis1.itch.io/out-of-the-blue?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt You wake up in a maze and you need to find your way out. You fight enemies, explore the map, collect items and manage your resources (such as bullets, water, grass, tea).

There's also an "energy" mechanic, you only get 32 steps before running out of energy and getting reset to your starting location - so keep an eye out for shortcuts, loops and secrets. Drinking tea also refills your energy.

There are two endings, depending on your actions.

➡️ More from Bozó Attila Bertold https://atis1.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More dungeon crawlers https://itch.io/games/tag-dungeon-crawler?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames

00:00 Intro
00:03 Ending 1
03:01 Ending 2
